title: Dulce amor
overview: The Bandi sisters, owners of a very famous candy factory, face one of their worst moments. Victoria  is in charge of the company and is Lorenzo's girlfriend , the man who, without Victoria knowing, does nothing but work to make him fall empire. However, the turns of life make Marcos, a former car racer, become the driver of this woman without joy. The arrival of this man in the family will change the fate of the Bandi, at all possible levels. Julián is a friend of Marcos, together they spend every free hour preparing the race car that Marcos runs. When the unexpected closure of the workshop where they work leaves him in the street, Julian follows in the footsteps of Marcos and becomes driver of Victoria's sister, Natacha, a beautiful woman fifteen years younger, which will drive him crazy and generate several problems in his marriage to Gabriela.
